Title: Vanguard-Palladors
Legend: Few other Stormcasts can hope to match the Palladors for speed. Their fleet Gryph-charger mounts make them excellent raiding forces, able to suddenly strike at a foe before any hope of resistance can be raised.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline in an Astral Templars army

Intro: Each model in a Vanguard-Palladors unit is armed with 1 of the following weapon options: Boltstorm Pistol and Shock Handaxe; or Boltstorm Pistol and Starstrike Javelin. All models in the unit must be armed with the same weapon option.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Vanguard Angelos Conclave • Godsmaw’s Vanguard

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Gryph-chargers are each armed with a Razor Beak and Claws.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Pallador-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristics of that model’s Boltstorm Pistol and Shock Handaxe or Boltstorm Pistol and Starstrike Javelin.

Rules.Name: Ride The Winds Aetheric
Rules.Fluff: Gryph-chargers can move faster than the eye can follow along the winds aetheric.
Rules.Rule: Ride the Winds Aetheric: Instead of picking this unit to make a normal move or retreat, you can say that it will ride the winds aetheric. If you do so, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 1" from all terrain features and objectives and more than 9" from all enemy units.
